snippet.title: Walpurgis + MMDoom: WaterSpirit
snippet.description:
Elemental system finalized! Most monsters now have "elements" to their defence and attacks. Just remember: Air beats Water, Water beats Fire, Fire beats Earth, Earth beats Air. Some misc elements, like Poison, are integrated (poison is Earth).

Gameplay mods: Walpurgis + MMDoom + NashGore
Map pack: WaterSpirit

Description: MMDoom is a ZDoom monster replacer allowing you to fight Might & Magic 6-8 monsters. Intended to be used with fantasy mods like Wrath of Cronos, Walpurgis or Heretical Doom. All sprites and sounds in the mod are imported from original games made by New World Computing. MMDoom is a free mod and I do not accept donations of any kind. Release in a few months.
